snippet: POSER--Joseph Edward. Born London, 30 July 1924, died New York, 24 December 2015. Former president of the American Fur Merchants Association and the International Fur Trade Federation. Survived by Mimi, his wife of 63 years, children Margaret, Nicholas (April Newbauer), Daphne (George Kalogerakis), grandchildren Rachel, Justin, Simon, brother Norman, sister Elizabeth Gribin, by relatives in the USA, England and Scandinavia, and will be missed by his many friends. 1/3
lead_paragraph: POSER--Joseph Edward. Born London, 30 July 1924, died New York, 24 December 2015. Former president of the American Fur Merchants Association and the International Fur Trade Federation. Survived by Mimi, his wife of 63 years, children Margaret, Nicholas (April Newbauer), Daphne (George Kalogerakis), grandchildren Rachel, Justin, Simon, brother Norman, sister Elizabeth Gribin, by relatives in the USA, England and Scandinavia, and will be missed by his many friends. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  POSER, JOSEPH EDWARD
